comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/487382
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=6e9b60183cf1bc7f9474c88407f6eff2f9319b3a
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 6e9b60183cf1bc7f9474c88407f6eff2f9319b3a
Author: Alex Szarka <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jul 28 16:24:58 2017 +0200

    fix test_rebuild_server_exc instability
    
    It depends on the environment we gets with
    instance-rebuild-error notification an another
    notification the compute-exception. In this
    case should ignore this event.
    So we select the instance-rebuild-error event
    into notification variable and we use this
    after.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1706533
    
    Change-Id: Ic872d7a7a741175ef02266cb029611c5016103a8
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
